description:
Wikipedia defines WordPress as a free and open source blogging tool and a content management system (CMS). Features include a plugin architecture and a template system. WordPress is used by more than 22.0% of the top 10 million websites as of August 2013.


ROADMAP

Build your first website using WordPress. Watch how a domain and a hosting service are registered. Learn how to install and link WordPress CMS to your domain. Add a customized webform, in which site’s visitors add their contact details and business enquiries. Additionally, learn to add the feature of getting those webform details archived in a back-end online database, which can be conveniently downloaded as a CSV file for all-at-one-place facility – ALL THIS with NO KNOWLEDGE of any programming language and in under an hour.

Start your business venture today! Take control of your own website and handle the valuable business enquiries with ease.

We will show you to process of building your website from scratch using the following steps:

  1. Domain Name & Hosting service
  2. Installing WordPress
  3. Make WordPress INDEX page your default landing page
  4. Add/Change Themes
  5. Add/Change webpages
  6. Add Plugins in Widget area (Contact Form, Contact Form Database)
  7. Remove Comment box
title: Guide to Using WordPress to Make Pro Websites Efficiently
